title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Global Citizenship Leadership and Social Responsibility Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish a social responsibility action plan based on the concept of global citizenship.
Learners can propose solutions to community issues through a service-learning project.
Learners can evaluate and implement strategies to promote social equity in multicultural environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
